settings.title: OPEN NOW
settings.text: We're NOW OPEN at 694 Te Atatu Road.
I smoked for over 30 years. I assumed that I would die from smoking. But vaping saved me!!
settings.name: SHAWN

settings.text: I never thought I'd quit smoking. Which was scary, as I knew it would kill me, but I just couldn't. But when I started vaping, things changed for good.
settings.name: Sabrina Smith

settings.text: I used to smoke 1.5 packs of cigarettes a day. I smoked my last cigarette about four years ago, when I started vaping.
settings.name: Fooshang

settings.title: Map 1
settings.address: 100 Larkin St, San Francisco, CA 94102, USA
